headline: Match Group Resets Costs And Trust Tools As Valuation Gap Widens
summary: Match Group (NasdaqGS: MTCH) is cutting around 13% of its workforce as part of an operational overhaul. The company is rolling out alternative payment options on its apps, aiming to reduce reliance on traditional app store billing. Match Group is increasing spending on trust and safety, including AI driven bot detection and a global Face Check feature. Match Group, which closed at $30.5, has seen a 10% decline over 1 year and a 28% decline over 3 years, with a much steeper 80.5% decline...
